description: <p>Senor Nurse/ AHP – Physical Health Check Service for Patients with Severe Mental Health Illness <br /><br />CLCH is working with Herts Valleys CCG and MIND to run a 12-month pilot for a small, dedicated outreach team made up of one nurse and an outreach worker to provide resource for individuals with severe mental illness that are unable or unwilling to engage with primary care and community teams. <br /><br />The team will take responsibility for engagement with the hardest to reach individuals, facilitating home visits and providing support. This post carries continuing responsibility for pro-active management of a caseload consisting of identified high intensity users with Severe Mental Illness. The post holder will work autonomously to provide a comprehensive, advanced assessment and care package to the patients and families, utilising support services and liaising with other agencies to ensure the complex needs of this client group are met. <br /><br />This post is being advertised at Band 7 level and is a four-day week post. The working hours are 8.30am to 4.30pm. Flexibility can be offered in terms of working days. The post is a fixed term contract for 12 months</p>
